name: com.buffbuffstudios.netbuff
description: NetBuff is a Unity Game Engine based multiplayer engine created as lightweight alternative without the giant overhead of other libraries such as NGO (Netcode for GameObjects) and third-party solutions (like Mirror).

samples.description: A sample created following the steps of the documentation page 'Getting Started'
A sample showcasing the local split screen feature
A sample showcasing how to customize the session data feature displayed on the documentation page 'Managing Sessions'
A sample showcasing how to load/unload scenes and move objects between scenes at run time. You can find information about it on the documentation page 'Scene Management'
